content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Introduction\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who Must Follow It?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" All employees, officers and Board members are expected to know and follow this Code. EPAM also expects all contractors, suppliers and other business partners to follow this Code when working for or with us. Failure to follow this Code can result in disciplinary action or termination of the relationship. Disciplinary action may also be taken against managers or officers who condone, permit or fail to take appropriate preventative, corrective or other action against illegal, unethical or other improper conduct. If you become aware of conduct that you think violates this Code, or that is or may be harmful to EPAM, you should let EPAM know.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who Can Help Me With Questions or Reporting Concerns?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" You have several options for raising concerns:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Contact your manager;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Raise your concerns with the Company's Compliance Officer, Anthony Conte, CFO;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can also raise your concern anonymously via EPAM's Hotline at internal x58888 or external 1-267-685-6741; or\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Submit your concern via e-mail at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:confidential@epacom\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"confidential@epacom\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM will protect your confidentiality to the extent it reasonably can, consistent with the relevant laws and EPAM's need to investigate.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What Happens If I Report A Possible Code Violation?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" EPAM will promptly investigate reported violations and will take appropriate corrective and/or disciplinary action. EPAM does not permit any retaliation against any employee who reports in good faith any known, suspected or potential Code violations or cooperates in good faith in any investigation. Any person who participates in retaliation is subject to disciplinary action, including termination. If you think you are being retaliated against for reporting a Code violation or cooperating in a related investigation, contact the Compliance Officer or EPAM's Hotline.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Where Can I Find a Copy of the Code? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A copy of this Code, as may be modified from time to time, may be found at  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Process Asset Library (PAL)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://code-of-conduct.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Table Of Contents\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I.
